quotes.text: We do recover.
Just for today, my thoughts will be on my recovery.
The darkest hour has only sixty minutes.
Hope is the companion of power, and mother of success; for who so hopes strongly has within him the gift of miracles.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.text: Recovery is not a race. You don't have to feel guilty if it takes you longer than you thought it would.
One day at a time.
The pain that you've been feeling, can't compare to the joy that's coming.
It does not matter how slowly you go, as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Progress, not perfection.
I am not telling you it's going to be easy. I'm telling you it's going to be worth it.
What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Recovery is hard. Regret is harder.
You are stronger than you think.
The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, I will try again tomorrow.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.text: Recovery is an acceptance that your life is in shambles and you have to change.
quotes.author: Jamie Lee Curtis

quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: We cannot live only for ourselves. A thousand fibers connect us.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.text: The opposite of addiction is connection.
quotes.author: Johann Hari

quotes.text: We keep what we have only by giving it away.
No matter how far down the scale we have gone, we will see how our experience can benefit others.
Asking for help is the first step to healing.
Fellowship is a place where you can be yourself and still feel accepted.
There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: We cannot do this alone. What we cannot do alone, we can do together.
Honesty is the first step in recovery.
We are only as sick as our secrets.
Half measures availed us nothing.
Willingness is what separates those who recover from those who do not.
The spiritual life is not a theory. We have to live it.
Our very lives depend on our constant thought of others and how we can help meet their needs.
Character is doing the right thing when nobody's looking.
quotes.author: J.C. Watts

quotes.text: Integrity is choosing courage over comfort.
quotes.author: Bren√© Brown

quotes.text: Our primary purpose is to stay clean and help other addicts achieve recovery.
Service is the rent we pay for living.
quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.text: You can't keep it unless you give it away.
When we try to help another addict, we see that five minutes clean are as important as five years clean.
Carrying the message is the basic service that our fellowship provides.
In helping others, we help ourselves.
The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Service keeps us from getting too self-centered.
What you do for yourself dies with you. What you do for others lives on forever.
Gratitude unlocks the fullness of life.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.text: When we were using, we didn't have enough of anything. In recovery, we have everything we need.
Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues, but the parent of all others.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.text: In our daily lives, we must see that it is not happiness that makes us grateful, but gratefulness that makes us happy.
quotes.author: David Steindl-Rast

quotes.text: Today I will be grateful for this day, for these challenges, and for this opportunity to grow.
Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.text: The miracle isn't that I finished. The miracle is that I had the courage to start.
quotes.author: John Bingham

quotes.text: Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: Every day may not be good, but there's something good in every day.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: What seems impossible today will one day become your warm-up.
We're all just walking each other home.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.text: Faith without works is dead.
